hadiths.text: Narrated 'Ali bin Abi Talib: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prohibited me from rings of gold, and from wearing Al-Qassi, and from reciting in the bowing and prostration positions, and from wearing what was dyed with 'Usfur." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ خَاتَمِ الذَّهَبِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Gold Rings Being Disliked
